document_data.name: Hill Giant Language
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hill giant language''', spoken by both [[hill giant]]s and [[mountain giant]]s. It was closely related to Jotunise, the language of [[frost giant]]s.
document_data.Speakers: In addition to the hill giants spread across the breadth of [[Faerûn]], the hill giant language was used among many of the merchants who did business within the [[Shining Lands]] of the [[Shining South]].
